Matt Stabile
Co-Founder, COO, Executive Data Science and Analytics Recruiter at Averity || Experienced Conference Speaker and Presenter
Do you want to be a remote Director of Data Science for a leading medical staffing firm with a focus on advanced forecasting? My client is looking fill this role before the end of March. Please reach out immediately for consideration.Compensation• $225,000 - $260,000• Full Benefits Package (Vision, Dental, Health)• 401(k) with Match• Fully RemoteWhat's The Job?As the Director of Data Science, you will be working remotely and overseeing two 4-person teams of Data Scientists and one team of Machine Learning Engineers. The goals is to grow the Data Science function to this size by the end of the year under your leadership.You will be working as a company-wide "internal consultant," building out data science solutions for different parts of the business. Therefore, you should have a wide breadth of modeling experience and have experience working at the enterprise level. Your main focus will be on forecasting models: what staff will be needed when and where? We hope to also build a matching algorithm to connect our clients with our staff more intelligently.Though you are a Director, you will still get to be hands-on developing and refining models to help improve their business practices. You should have good leadership experience and have come up through the ranks at your company as a data scientist and shown growth and leadership capability. Who Are They?My client is the leading firm in the travel medical staffing space and they are growing quickly this year. In fact, for over a decade, they have ranked in the nation's top 5,000 fastest growing companies with over 250% growth over a three-year period.***Please apply here or contact me directly to learn more at: Matt.Stabile@Averityteam.com.
